vernac_cmds: From mathcomp Require Import ssrbool ssrnat eqtype.
Require Import Show Sets GenLow GenHigh RoseTrees Checker Classes.
Definition resultSuccessful (r : Result) : bool := match r with | MkResult (Some res) expected _ _ _ _ _ => res == expected | _ => true end.
Definition successful qp := match qp with | MkProp (MkRose res _) => resultSuccessful res end.
Definition semCheckerSize (c : Checker) (s : nat): Prop := successful @: semGenSize c s \subset [set true].
Definition semChecker (c : Checker) : Prop := forall s, semCheckerSize c s.
Definition semCheckableSize {A} `{Checkable A} (a : A) (s : nat) : Prop := semCheckerSize (checker a) s.
Definition semCheckable {A} `{Checkable A} (a : A) : Prop := semChecker (checker a).
Lemma semChecker_def2 c : semChecker c <-> (forall qp, semGen c qp -> successful qp = true).
Lemma semChecker_def3 c : semChecker c <-> (successful @: semGen c \subset [set true]).
Definition genChecker c := fmap successful c.
Class UnsizedChecker (c : Checker) := { unsizedChecker : forall s1 s2 : nat, semGenSize (genChecker c) s1 <--> semGenSize (genChecker c) s2 }.
Class SizeMonotonicChecker (c : Checker) := { monotonicChecker : forall s1 s2, s1 <= s2 -> semGenSize (genChecker c) s1 \subset semGenSize (genChecker c) s2 }.
Lemma unsizedChecker_alt_def (c : Checker) `{UnsizedChecker c} : forall s1 s2, semCheckerSize c s1 <-> semCheckerSize c s2.
rewrite /semCheckerSize => s1 s2; split; move : H => [/(_ s1 s2) H]; rewrite /genChecker in H; setoid_rewrite semFmapSize in H; by rewrite H.
Lemma monotonicChecker_alt_def (c : Checker) `{SizeMonotonicChecker c} : forall s1 s2, s1 <= s2 -> semCheckerSize c s2 -> semCheckerSize c s1.
move : H => [/(_ s1 s2 Hle) /= H].
rewrite /genChecker in H; setoid_rewrite semFmapSize in H.
Program Instance unsizedMonotonicChecker (c : Checker) `{UnsizedChecker c} : SizeMonotonicChecker c.

Lemma mapTotalResult_idSize {C} `{Checkable C} (f : Result -> Result) (c : C) s : (forall res, resultSuccessful res = resultSuccessful (f res)) -> (semCheckerSize (mapTotalResult f c) s <-> semCheckableSize c s).
Lemma mapTotalResult_id {C} `{Checkable C} (f : Result -> Result) (c : C) : (forall res, resultSuccessful res = resultSuccessful (f res)) -> (semChecker (mapTotalResult f c) <-> semCheckable c).
move=> eq_res; split => H' s; eapply mapTotalResult_idSize; eauto.
Lemma semCallback_idSize {C} `{Checkable C} (cb : Callback) (c : C) (s : nat) : semCheckerSize (callback cb c) s <-> semCheckableSize c s.
apply mapTotalResult_idSize in H' => //; by move => [? ? ? ? ? ?].
Lemma semCallback_id {C} `{Checkable C} (cb : Callback) (c : C) : semChecker (callback cb c) <-> semCheckable c.
split => H' s; eapply semCallback_idSize; eauto.
Lemma semWhenFail_idSize {C} `{Checkable C} (str : String.string) (c : C) s : semCheckerSize (whenFail str c) s <-> semCheckableSize c s.
Lemma semWhenFail_id {C} `{Checkable C} (str : String.string) (c : C) : semChecker (whenFail str c) <-> semCheckable c.
Lemma semPrintTestCase_idSize {C} `{Checkable C} (str : String.string) (c : C) s : semCheckerSize (printTestCase str c) s <-> semCheckableSize c s.
Lemma semPrintTestCase_id {C} `{Checkable C} (str : String.string) (c : C) : semChecker (printTestCase str c) <-> semCheckable c.
Lemma semShrinking_idSize {C A} {HCheck : Checkable C} (sh : A -> list A) (x : A) (pf : A -> C) (s : nat) : semCheckerSize (shrinking sh x pf) s <-> semCheckableSize (pf x) s.
unfold semCheckableSize, shrinking, semCheckerSize, semGenSize, props.
have [n <-] : exists n, S n = 1000 by eexists; reflexivity.
move => H b [[[res [l]]] [/= [seed Hgen] H']]; subst.
suff : successful (run (fmap (fun x0 => {| unProp := joinRose (fmapRose unProp x0) |}) (promote (@props' _ _ HCheck (S n) pf sh x))) s seed).
destruct ((run (checker (pf x)) s seed)) as [[res [l']]] eqn:Heq=> //=.
Lemma semShrinking_id {C A} {HCheck : Checkable C} (sh : A -> list A) (x : A) (pf : A -> C) : semChecker (shrinking sh x pf) <-> semCheckable (pf x).
split; move => H s; eapply semShrinking_idSize; first by eauto.
Lemma semCover_idSize {C} `{Checkable C} (b: bool) (n: nat) (str : String.string) (c : C) (s : nat) : semCheckerSize (cover b n str c) s <-> semCheckableSize c s.
Lemma semCover_id {C} `{Checkable C} (b: bool) (n: nat) (str : String.string) (c : C) : semChecker (cover b n str c) <-> semCheckable c.
split; move => H' s; eapply semCover_idSize; first by eauto.
Lemma semClassify_idSize {C} `{Checkable C} (b: bool) (str : String.string) (c : C) (s : nat) : semCheckerSize (classify b str c) s <-> semCheckableSize c s.
Lemma semClassify_id {C} `{Checkable C} (b: bool) (str : String.string) (c : C) : semChecker (classify b str c) <-> semCheckable c.
Lemma semLabel_idSize {C} `{Checkable C} (str : String.string) (c : C) (s : nat) : semCheckerSize (label str c) s <-> semCheckableSize c s.
Lemma semLabel_id {C} `{Checkable C} (str : String.string) (c : C) : semChecker (label str c) <-> semCheckable c.
Lemma semCollect_idSize {C} `{Checkable C} (str : String.string) (c : C) (s : nat) : semCheckerSize (collect str c) s <-> semCheckableSize c s.
Lemma semCollect_id {C} `{Checkable C} (str : String.string) (c : C) : semChecker (collect str c) <-> semCheckable c.
Lemma semImplicationSize {C} `{Checkable C} (c : C) (b : bool) s : semCheckerSize (b ==> c) s <-> (b -> semCheckableSize c s).
case: b; split=> //=; first by move/(_ refl_equal).
Lemma semImplication {C} `{Checkable C} (c : C) (b : bool) : semChecker (b ==> c) <-> (b -> semCheckable c).
split; [move => H1 b' s' | move => H1 s b']; eapply semImplicationSize; try by eauto.
Program Instance implicationUnsized {C} `{Checkable C} b (c : C) `{UnsizedChecker (checker c)} : UnsizedChecker (b ==> c).
Program Instance implicationMonotonic {C} `{Checkable C} b (c : C) `{SizeMonotonicChecker (checker c)} : SizeMonotonicChecker (b ==> c).
Lemma semReturnGenSize (qp : QProp) (s: nat) : semCheckerSize (returnGen qp) s <-> semCheckableSize qp s.
Lemma semReturnGen (qp : QProp) : semChecker (returnGen qp) <-> semCheckable qp.
Lemma semBindGenSize {A} (gen : G A) (f : A -> Checker) (s: nat): semCheckerSize (bindGen gen f) s <-> forall a, semGenSize gen s a -> semCheckerSize (f a) s.
Lemma semBindGenUsinzed1 {A} (gen : G A) (f : A -> Checker) `{Unsized _ gen} : (semChecker (bindGen gen f) <-> forall a, semGen gen a -> semChecker (f a)).
by eapply semBindGenSize in Hgen; eauto.
by eapply semBindGenSize; intros; apply Hgen; eexists; split => //; eauto.
Lemma semBindGenUsinzed2 {A} (gen : G A) (f : A -> Checker) `{forall a, UnsizedChecker (f a)} : (semChecker (bindGen gen f) <-> forall a, semGen gen a -> semChecker (f a)).
eapply semBindGenSize in Hgen; last by eauto.
by eapply semBindGenSize; intros; apply Hgen; eexists; split => //; eauto.

Lemma semBindGenSizeMonotonic {A} (gen : G A) (f : A -> Checker) `{SizeMonotonic _ gen} `{forall a, SizeMonotonicChecker (f a)} : (semChecker (bindGen gen f) <-> forall a, semGen gen a -> semChecker (f a)).
by eapply semBindGenSize; intros; apply Hgen; eexists; split => //; eauto.
Lemma semPredQPropSize (c : Checker) (s : nat) : semCheckableSize c s <-> (semCheckerSize c s).
split; move => Hqp qp Hsize; auto.
Lemma semPredQProp (c : Checker) : semCheckable c <-> semChecker c.
split => H s; eapply semPredQPropSize; eauto.
Instance forAllMonotonic {A C} {_ : Checkable C} `{Show A} (g : G A) (f : A -> C) `{SizeMonotonic _ g} `{forall x, SizeMonotonicChecker (checker (f x))} : SizeMonotonicChecker (forAll g f).
Lemma semForAllSize {A C} `{Show A, Checkable C} (g : G A) (f : A -> C) (s:nat) : semCheckerSize (forAll g f) s <-> forall (a : A), a \in semGenSize g s -> semCheckableSize (f a) s.
Lemma semForAllUnsized1 {A C} `{Show A, Checkable C} (g : G A) (f : A -> C) `{Unsized _ g} : (semChecker (forAll g f) <-> forall (a : A), a \in semGen g -> semCheckable (f a)).
eapply semForAllSize in H'; first by eauto.
move => s; eapply semForAllSize; move => a Hgen.

Lemma semForAllUnsized2 {A C} `{Show A, Checkable C} (g : G A) (f : A -> C) `{forall a, UnsizedChecker (checker (f a))} : (semChecker (forAll g f) <-> forall (a : A), a \in semGen g -> semCheckable (f a)).
eapply semForAllSize in H'; last by eauto.
move => s; eapply semForAllSize; move => a Hgen.

Lemma semForAllSizeMonotonic {A C} `{Show A, Checkable C} (g : G A) (f : A -> C) `{SizeMonotonic _ g} `{forall a, SizeMonotonicChecker (checker (f a))} : (semChecker (forAll g f) <-> forall (a:A), a \in semGen g -> semCheckable (f a)).
by eapply semForAllSize; intros; apply Hcheck; eexists; split => //; eauto.
Lemma unsized_printTestCase {A C} `{Checkable C} `{Show A} (c : A -> C) : (forall a, Unsized (checker (c a))) -> (forall a, Unsized (printTestCase (String.append (Show.show a) newline) (c a))).
Lemma curry_uncurry {A B C : Type} (f : A -> B -> C) : curry (uncurry f) = f.
Lemma uncurry_curry {A B C : Type} (f : A * B -> C) : uncurry (curry f) = f.
Lemma mergeBinds' : forall A B C (ga : G A) (gb : G B) (f : A * B -> G C), semGen (bindGen ga (fun x => bindGen gb ((curry f) x))) <--> semGen (bindGen (genPair ga gb) f).
Lemma eq_to_impl : forall (a b : Prop), a = b -> a -> b.

Lemma mergeForAlls {A B C : Type} `{Checkable C} `{Show A} `{Show B} (ga : G A) (gb : G B) (f : A -> B -> C) : semChecker (forAll ga (fun a => forAll gb (f a))) <-> semChecker (forAll (genPair ga gb) (uncurry f)).
apply semForAllSize; move => [a b] /= /semLiftGen2Size [[a' b'] [[/= Hg1 Hg2] [Heq1 Heq2]]]; subst.
by eapply semForAllSize in HforAll; eauto.

Lemma semForAllShrinkSize: forall {A C} `{Checkable C} `{Show A} (gen : G A) (f : A -> C) shrinker (size: nat), semCheckerSize (forAllShrink gen shrinker f) size <-> forall a : A, semGenSize gen size a -> semCheckableSize (f a) size.
move => A C H show gen pf shrink.

Lemma semForAllShrinkUnsized1 : forall {A C} `{Checkable C} `{Show A} (gen : G A) (f : A -> C) shrinker `{Unsized _ gen}, (semChecker (forAllShrink gen shrinker f) <-> forall a : A, semGen gen a -> semCheckable (f a)).
eapply semForAllShrinkSize in H'; first by eauto.
move => s; eapply semForAllShrinkSize; move => a Hgen.

Lemma semForAllShrinkUnsized2 : forall {A C} `{Checkable C} `{Show A} (gen : G A) (f : A -> C) shrinker `{forall a, UnsizedChecker (checker (f a))}, (semChecker (forAllShrink gen shrinker f) <-> forall a : A, semGen gen a -> semCheckable (f a)).
eapply semForAllShrinkSize in H'; last by eauto.
move => s; eapply semForAllShrinkSize; move => a Hgen.

Lemma semForAllShrinkMonotonic : forall {A C} `{Checkable C} `{Show A} (gen : G A) (f : A -> C) shrinker `{SizeMonotonic _ gen}, (forall a, SizeMonotonicChecker (checker (f a))) -> (semChecker (forAllShrink gen shrinker f) <-> forall a : A, semGen gen a -> semCheckable (f a)).
move => A C H1 H2 gen f sh Hmon1 Hmon2.
by eapply semForAllShrinkSize; intros; apply Hcheck; eexists; split => //; eauto.
Lemma bool_successful : forall b, resultSuccessful (liftBool b) = b.
Lemma semCheckableBoolSize (b : bool) size : semCheckableSize b size <-> b.
Lemma semCheckableBool (b : bool) : semCheckable b <-> b.
split; [move => /(_ 0) H | move => H s]; eapply semCheckableBoolSize; eauto.
Program Instance boolUnsized (b : bool) : UnsizedChecker (checker b).
Lemma semCheckableResultSize: forall (res: Result) (size: nat), semCheckableSize res size <-> resultSuccessful res.
Lemma semCheckableResult : forall (res: Result), semCheckable res <-> resultSuccessful res.
split; [move => /(_ 0) H | move => H s]; eapply semCheckableResultSize; eauto.
Program Instance resultUnsized (r : Result) : UnsizedChecker (checker r).
Lemma semCheckableUnitSize (t : unit) size : semCheckableSize t size <-> True.
Lemma semCheckableUnit (t : unit) : semCheckable t <-> True.
split; [move => /(_ 0) H | move => H s]; eapply semCheckableUnitSize; eauto.
Lemma semCheckableQPropSize (qp : QProp) size : semCheckableSize qp size <-> successful qp.
Lemma semCheckableQProp (qp : QProp) : semCheckable qp <-> successful qp.
split; [move => /(_ 0) H | move => H s]; eapply semCheckableQPropSize; eauto.
Program Instance qpUnsized (qp : QProp) : UnsizedChecker (checker qp).
Lemma semCheckableGenSize: forall (P : Type) {H : Checkable P} (gen: G P) (size : nat), (semCheckableSize gen size) <-> (forall p, semGenSize gen size p -> semCheckableSize p size).

Lemma semCheckableFunSize: forall {A C} {H1 : Show A} `{H2 : Arbitrary A} {H3 : Checkable C} (f : A -> C) (size: nat), semCheckableSize f size <-> forall (a : A), semGenSize arbitrary size a -> semCheckableSize (f a) size.
move=> A C H1 H2 H3 f.
Lemma semCheckablePolyFunSize: forall {C : Type -> Type} {H : Checkable (C nat)} (f : forall T, C T) (size : nat), (semCheckableSize f size) <-> (semCheckableSize (f nat) size).
Lemma semCheckablePolyFunSetSize: forall {C : Set -> Type} {H : Checkable (C nat)} (f : forall T, C T) (size: nat), (semCheckableSize f size) <-> (semCheckableSize (f nat) size).
Program Instance uncurryUsized {A B} (f : A -> B -> Checker) p `{UnsizedChecker (f (fst p) (snd p))} : UnsizedChecker (uncurry f p).
Class Provable (A : Type) {H: Checkable A} : Type := { proposition : nat -> A -> Prop; proposition_equiv : forall a s, proposition s a <-> semCheckableSize a s }.
Program Instance proveResult : Provable Result := {| proposition s r := resultSuccessful r |}.
Program Instance proveUnit : Provable unit := {| proposition := fun _ _ => True |}.
Program Instance proveQProp : Provable QProp := {| proposition s qp := successful qp = true |}.
Program Instance proveBool : Provable bool := {| proposition s b := b = true |}.
Program Instance proveGenProp {C} `{Provable C} : Provable (G C) := {| proposition s g := (forall p, semGenSize g s p -> proposition s p) |}.
Program Instance proveChecker : Provable Checker := {| proposition s g := semCheckerSize g s |}.
split; intros H; by apply semPredQPropSize.
Program Instance proveFun {A C: Type} `{Arbitrary A} `{Show A} `{Provable C}: Provable (A -> C) := {| proposition s p := (forall a, semGenSize arbitrary s a -> proposition s (p a)) |}.
match goal with | [ Hyp : Provable _ |- _ ] => destruct Hyp as [semP proof] end.
Program Instance provePolyFun {C : Type -> Type} `{Provable (C nat)} : Provable (forall T, C T) := { proposition s f := proposition s (f nat) }.
Program Instance provePolyFunSet {C : Set -> Type} `{Provable (C nat)} : Provable (forall T, C T) := { proposition s f := proposition s (f nat) }.

command: rewrite /semCheckerSize => s1 s2; split; move : H => [/(_ s1 s2) H]; rewrite /genChecker in H; setoid_rewrite semFmapSize in H; by rewrite H.
move : H => [/(_ s1 s2 Hle) /= H].
rewrite /genChecker in H; setoid_rewrite semFmapSize in H.
move=> eq_res; split => H' s; eapply mapTotalResult_idSize; eauto.
apply mapTotalResult_idSize in H' => //; by move => [? ? ? ? ? ?].
split => H' s; eapply semCallback_idSize; eauto.
split; move => H s; eapply semShrinking_idSize; first by eauto.
split; move => H' s; eapply semCover_idSize; first by eauto.
case: b; split=> //=; first by move/(_ refl_equal).
split; [move => H1 b' s' | move => H1 s b']; eapply semImplicationSize; try by eauto.
eapply semBindGenSize in Hgen; last by eauto.
by eapply semBindGenSize; intros; apply Hgen; eexists; split => //; eauto.
by eapply semBindGenSize; intros; apply Hgen; eexists; split => //; eauto.
split; move => Hqp qp Hsize; auto.
split => H s; eapply semPredQPropSize; eauto.
eapply semForAllSize in H'; first by eauto.
move => s; eapply semForAllSize; move => a Hgen.
eapply semForAllSize in H'; last by eauto.
move => s; eapply semForAllSize; move => a Hgen.
by eapply semForAllSize; intros; apply Hcheck; eexists; split => //; eauto.
move => A C H show gen pf shrink.
eapply semForAllShrinkSize in H'; first by eauto.
move => s; eapply semForAllShrinkSize; move => a Hgen.
eapply semForAllShrinkSize in H'; last by eauto.
move => s; eapply semForAllShrinkSize; move => a Hgen.
move => A C H1 H2 gen f sh Hmon1 Hmon2.
by eapply semForAllShrinkSize; intros; apply Hcheck; eexists; split => //; eauto.
split; [move => /(_ 0) H | move => H s]; eapply semCheckableBoolSize; eauto.
split; [move => /(_ 0) H | move => H s]; eapply semCheckableResultSize; eauto.
split; [move => /(_ 0) H | move => H s]; eapply semCheckableUnitSize; eauto.
move=> A C H1 H2 H3 f.
split; intros H; by apply semPredQPropSize.
match goal with | [ Hyp : Provable _ |- _ ] => destruct Hyp as [semP proof] end.
